title: Revolt 10
text: I’m gonna have to be honest here i’m not a fan of revolt 10 the original was way better I could find everything so easy but now with the update I feel like i can’t find anything, where’s the vault it’s just gone i can find it at all checked every page I would hope we can still choose to use the original design also i got someone signed up and it said i would get the 110 and I did it in time but it only gave me 85 for the referral 🥲 I prefer the old revolt app design

title: Not happy about the new app design
text: I really liked the older app, the new app interface doesn’t seem as intuitive and took me forever to find my vaults.

title: Nice app
text: The functionalities such as vault work great for me. And all for free. I also like the UX design.

title: Like the app but would like a option for classic look
text: Hi I like this whole new idea of innovation but for me the classic look is best too much going on please add a tap to keep the classic look .

title: Outstanding
text: I recently was upset that they used prepaid cards and I almost didn’t use this service.. man would I have missed out on the best finance app in the entire App Store.. this product is unrivaled..I understand now why they do the things they do and why.. transferring money to yourself and others could not be done better.. I’ve Used every product from capital one to chime.. nothing comes close.. if I could I would do free advertising for them just because of how much convenience Revolut has brought to my life..I can’t give enough stars..I’m shocked that they are ranked 96 of the financial apps.. if people words just try it they would see that it is far And away the best…I’m not even getting to the fact that you can create multi use cards and single use cards for security.. and the information on each transaction is unparalleled.. please give it a try.. it is by far the best financial decision you will ever make…

title: Miss Whesu
text: It as been amazing transaction with REVOLUT, even when decline is need you are prompt to respond.

title: No transfer
text: It irritates me knowing I can’t pull money off it or send it back to my actual bank account…it will not let you transfer obey off it unless you at a ATM

title: I don’t understand the rant
text: I’ve been using Revolut for quite some time now and I love it! I don’t understand what people are complaining about honestly, my experience is very smooth. And they are very transparent about the fees and transactions. My account is free and it is free! EU transactions are free and atm withdrawals are free most of the time, yes not always but that’s ok.

title: Adi Turcu
text: Best app ever to sent and received money all over the wolrd.

title: A godsend during my recent travel
text: Revolut was extremely helpful during my trip abroad. I travelled from the US to France and transferring money from my US bank account to Revolut then exchanging it to Euros was a breeze on the app. I like that I can go to the ATMs Revolut lists as being compatible with their cards and withdraw cash without ATM fees and pay Revolut less than $4 in service fees. It was, however, frustrating that I had to wait 24 hours to withdraw more money if I had already taken out more than $200. I recommend this for US-based travelers who only want cash when needed vs withdrawing a lot of foreign currency up-front just to not use all of it. I can’t speak for their actual banking nor their customer service, but as a casual user of the product, I would recommend.

title: Ease in transferring Fund Internationally
text: This was the first bank/app that made sending funds internationally easy for me without the need for tedious paper work at the bank branch.

title: Freshly updated asks for update
text:
I have just updated the app and now it won’t let me in at all 🤦‍♀️ keep showing a screen with “Your app is out of date”. And there is just one button “Update”. But since it’s just been updated it’s impossible to do… That’s a huge bug guys….

UPD Problem solved by myself via web interface and e-mail. So I’m changing from 1 star to 4.

title: Simply the Best
text: Revolut has become - by far - the best in online banking. And now they even offer a Pro account with unlimited cashback.

title: Additional feature
text: Would love to be able to give shares as gift to my child account!

title: Expat Loving Revolut
text: American expat living in Sweden with student loans back home. This service and app work perfectly for my situation. I receive my pay in Swedish Krona, convert to USD with no fees with my Premium membership, and then transfer what I need to my American account and it arrives same-day.  All for around $16 per month, Premium Fee is 94.99 SEK and international transfer fee comes out to around $9 per month.
